_comment: OTA manifest — read by the SmartNode web UI (devices page). To release a new version: 1) Bump MODULE_VERSION in firmware/DevBoard/src/module_manifest.h  2) Build with PlatformIO  3) Upload .pio/build/esp32-c6-devkitc-1/firmware.bin to your GitHub release as firmware-vX.X.X.bin  4) Update 'version' and 'url' below  5) Commit & push — devices will show the Update button automatically.
